accomplishments.description: Aligned product work with required development targets (timeline accuracy and predictability).
Lead multiple teams and oversee initiatives consisting of employees and consultants across multiple continents.
Reduced operational expenses by 100k annually by optimizing vendor offerings.
Increased developer productivity by over 40% through evaluating and changing development processes.
Stabilized deployment processes by implementing a branching strategy more closely aligned to business processes.

Demonstrated, taught, and helped teams implement through formal training concepts relating to software development including: functional programming, ux design principles, and programming language concepts.
